conversationHistory.userMessage: How should I store leftover dal to prevent waste?
conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! I can help you reduce dal waste.

• Refrigerate leftover dal in an airtight container. It should last for 3-4 days.

• Freeze dal in portion-sized containers for up to 2 months. Thaw in the refrigerator before reheating.

• Make dal paratha using the leftover dal (approximately 40 BDT).

Reducing food waste lessens pressure on Bangladesh's landfills.

Next step: Refrigerate your leftover dal immediately after it cools down.
